article.para: 本节说明在Ubuntu中如何导入、管理和使用您的音乐、视频和照片。

sect1.title: Music and audio
sect1.para: Whether you want to play, rip, edit or organize your music, Ubuntu has the tools you need.

sect2.title: 音乐播放及管理
sect2.para: Ubuntu自带了Rhythmbox 音乐播放器来播放及管理您的音乐，它可以从以下位置启动：应用程序影音Rhythmbox 音乐播放器。
刚您第一次启动Rhythmbox时，它会自动在您的主目录中扫描所有支持的音乐文件以便您播放。
Rhythmbox supports many useful features, some of which are turned off by default. For example, it can show the album cover of the song currently being played, or share music with others.
To access these optional features, press EditPlugins... and select the features which you would like to use by ticking them.
See the Rhythmbox manual for more information.

sect2.title: 播放音乐CD
sect2.para: 当你放入一张音乐CD时，音乐榨汁机程序将会自动运行，它既是一个音乐CD播放器，又是一个音轨抓取程序。如果你已经连接到互联网，音乐榨汁机会显示出CD的表演者，专辑和音轨标题等信息。
您可以单击播放按钮开始播放CD，或者按CtrlP组合键。如果您想听某一首歌曲可以在它上面双击，或者选中之后再点播放按钮。
作为音乐榨汁机这外的另一种选择，Rhythmbox音乐播放器也可以播放音乐CD。在您放入音乐CD之后，启动Rhythmbox音乐播放器程序，然后源列表中双击音乐CD。

sect2.title: 抓取CD音轨
sect2.para: 如果您愿意把CD中的音轨复制一份到电脑上，您就不必每次想听音乐时放入CD了。在Ubuntu中您可以把音轨抓取或者说提取到电脑上。
音乐榨汁机可以为您抓取CD音轨。首先启动音乐榨汁机程序，选择应用程序影音音乐榨汁机，或者当您放入CD时它也会自动运行。
Follow the instructions in the Sound Juicer manual on how to rip audio CDs.

sect2.title: Other audio-related tasks
sect2.para: Ubuntu provides a wide range of tools for all of your audio playing, editing and recording needs.

para.emphasis: Change the track details of music

listitem.para: If you have music files which have incorrect or incomplete information about the artist or album which they are from, install Cowbell Music Organizer. Cowbell allows you to edit track details, and can automatically correct track information for many CDs.

Many alternative music players are available apart from the default Rhythmbox Music Player. These include Amarok, Banshee Music Player, Beep Media Player, Exaile! and Muine Music Player. Each player has its own strengths and weaknesses, and which one you use will probably depend on personal preference.

Podcasts are a way of listening to music and radio shows broadcast on the Internet. Thousands of different shows are available, such as BBC Radio, LugRadio and The Naked Scientists. The Rhythmbox Music Player is able to play podcasts. See the Rhythmbox manual for more information.

If you have appropriate audio hardware (such as a microphone), you can record sounds onto your computer. Press AltF2, type gnome-sound-recorder and press Run to start the Sound Recorder. See the Sound Recorder manual for further instructions.
To edit audio, install Jokosher or Audacity. Jokosher is able to record audio as well as edit it, and Audacity provides many powerful sound-editing features.

para.emphasis: Install a full suite of multimedia editing applications

listitem.para: If you would like to turn your computer into a multimedia production suite, why not consider installing Ubuntu Studio? It provides a large selection of applications for creating audio, video and graphics.

sect2.title: 在线收听音乐
sect2.para: 您可以在互联网上收听音频流。您可以把它理解为一种在线广播，就像传统的无线电广播一样。
Rhythmbox可以播放大多数的音频流，比如在线播音节目等。然而，有些服务则需要特定的播放器才能收听到。

listitem.para: 要收听Last.fm音乐广播，请安装Last-Exit播放器。
要收听收看Real Media格式的音频和视频流，请安装RealPlayer 10。RealPlayer在Commercial软件库中可以找到。

sect2.para: 有关安装新软件的帮助请参阅添加程序。

sect2.title: 使用iPod
sect2.para: 您可以通过Rhythmbox 音乐播放器直接播放iPod里的音乐。将iPod插入计算机，然后打开Rhythmbox。
若想从iPod传输音乐文件，您可以使用gtkpod：

step.para: 您可以从Universe软件库安装gtkpod程序(请参阅添加程序)。
要运行 gtkpod，请选择 应用程序影音gtkpod

sect2.para: 需要进一步了解如何在Ubuntu中使用iPod，请参阅社区支持

sect2.title: 使用其它随身听
sect2.para: Ubuntu还支持许多其它类型的随身听，大多数情况下您只需要把它们插入电脑，然后把音乐复制上去。
使用创新Nomad Jukebox随身听的用户需要从Universe软件库中安装gnomad2程序才能使用这一设备(请参阅添加程序)。

sect1.title: Movies, DVDs and videos
sect1.para: 在Ubuntu中，您可以使用Totem电影播放机来看电影和视频。
要启动Totem，点击应用程序影音电影播放机。

sect2.title: 播放DVD
sect2.para: In order to play DVDs, you must install some additional software. Unfortunately, DVD support cannot be provided by default in Ubuntu due to legal and technical restrictions.

caution.para: Many commercial DVDs are encrypted and so require the use of decryption software in order to play them. In some countries, the use of such decryption software is not permitted by law. Verify that you are within your rights in using it.

step.para: Install the following packages (see Add Applications):

If you would like to play encrypted DVDs (see the legal note above), press ApplicationsAccessoriesTerminal and type the following into the screen which appears, followed by the Return key:sudo /usr/share/doc/libdvdread3/install-css.sh
Press SystemPreferencesRemovable Drives and Media and click on the Multimedia tab.
在DVD影碟下面的命令框里，输入gxine -S dvd:/(不含引号)，然后单击关闭按钮。
拿一张DVD盘放入电脑的DVD驱动器中，Ubuntu会自动运行gxine播放这张盘。全屏观看请按f键。

sect2.title: 播放专属格式的媒体
sect2.para: 视频文件有不同格式，其中一些是专属格式或商用格式。Ubuntu默认不能支持这些格式，因此您安装其它软件来播放它们，下列这些软件可以播放一些默认不支持的格式。

listitem.para: 装有Xine附加插件的gxine程序。

sect2.para: 有关安装新软件的帮助请参阅添加程序。
有关安装其它音频和视频格式支持的信息请参阅多媒体编码。

sect2.title: 在浏览器中收看视频
sect2.para: 互联网上有很多视频可以直接在浏览器中观看，然而它们大多需要试先安装额外的浏览器插件。
所需的插件取决于您要观看的视频格式，以下这个清单是可用于默认的Firefox网络浏览器的一些插件。

listitem.para: For the Mplayer plugin, install the mozilla-mplayer package.
For the VLC plugin, install the mozilla-plugin-vlc package.
For the Helix plugin, install the mozilla-helix-player package.

For a free (open-source) Flash plugin, install the mozilla-plugin-gnash package. For the proprietary Flash plugin, install the flashplugin-nonfree package. See Flash multimedia plugin for more information.

sect2.para: 有关安装软件的帮忙，请参阅添加程序。
安装了新的插件以后，请重新启动Firefox使其生效。

sect2.title: 收看视频播客
sect2.para: 除了在线的音频广播(播客)，互联网上还有许多视频广播。Ubuntu为您提供了一些可选的视频播客播放程序:
有关安装新软件的帮助请参阅添加程序。

sect2.title: 视频的录制与编辑
sect2.para: Ubuntu为您提供了一些精选的视频录制与编辑工具。

listitem.para: DeVeDe是一个DVD创作程序，您可以使用它来制作DVD光盘，制作出来的光盘可以在普通DVD机中播放。
Kino 是一个高级视频编辑器。它提供了与 IEEE-1394 (火线) 的出色集成，用于视屏捕捉、VTR 控制以及回录到摄像机。它可以分别采用 type-1 DV 和 type-2 DV (独立音频流) 编码将捕捉的视频以 Raw DV 和 AVI 格式保存到磁盘上。
详情请参见Kino网站。
Pitivi视频编辑器是一个简单好用的视频编辑程序。
Stopmotion可以在您的视频中添加时间静止特效。
字幕编辑器可以编辑视频的字幕。
Thoggen DVD抓取程序可以把您的DVD光盘备份到电脑上。

sect2.para: 有关安装新软件的帮助请参阅添加程序。

sect1.title: What is a codec?
sect1.para: 多媒体解码器一种用于播放特定视频或音乐的小软件，目前有很多种不同的多媒体格式，因此您需要安装好几种解码器。Ubuntu默认自带了许多解码器。
Ubuntu 中的许多应用程序都使用 GStreamer 开源多媒体框架。GStreamer 的编解码器插件根据其所适用的不同授权许可而被组织在不同的软件包中。您可以在 GStreamer 网站 上找到哪些插件中包含了哪些编解码器。

Other applications, such as Mplayer and Xine, do not use the Gstreamer framework. Due to patent and copyright restrictions, codecs for these programs are not included in Ubuntu by default. For more information on these read the Restricted Formats wiki page.
To install extra codecs, press ApplicationsAdd/Remove..., type codec in the Search box and select which codecs you want to install. Press Apply to install the selected codecs.

warning.para: In some countries, the use of certain codecs may be prohibited by law. You should verify that you are permitted to use them before installing them.

sect1.title: Photos and cameras
sect1.para: Ubuntu中有许多工具可以帮您管理您的数码照片。

sect2.title: 从数码相机导入相片
sect2.para: Ubuntu可以自动识别出大多数的数码相机，当您连接上相机后，Ubuntu会提示您是否需要导入。
从相机导入照片:

step.para: 将连接线插入电脑接口，打开相机电源并且将其设定在查看模式，Ubuntu会询问您是否导入相机中的照片。
单击导入按钮，您将会看到照片的预览图。
选择保存照片的目录，单击导入之后照片将保存到您的硬盘里。

sect2.para: 如果 Ubuntu 没有询问您是否要导入这些照片：

step.para: 打开应用程序图像F-Spot 照片管理器，选择文件导入...。
将您的相机选择为导入源，然后单击导入按钮开始导入。

sect2.para: 如果您的相机没有出现在导入源中，点击位置计算机查看您的相机是否作为一个移动存储设备出现。如果有，您可以在文件浏览器里手工复制这些照片。

sect2.title: 照片管理
sect2.para: F-Spot为您提供一管完整的照片管理解决方案，您可以选择应用程序图像F-Spot 照片管理器来启动它。
在F-Spot中，您可以从数码相机或USB棒中导入照片，用熟悉词语给它们加上标签，给照片润色并且适当修饰。除此之外，您还可以把照片上传到 Flickr, PicasaWeb 或者其它网络相册中。
For help with F-Spot Photo Manager, see the F-Spot User Guide.

sect2.title: Watch a slideshow of photos
sect2.para: If you want to show off your photos in all of their glory, why not run a slideshow of them?

listitem.para: Watch a slideshow using the Image Viewer
Watch a slideshow using the F-Spot Photo Manager

sect3.title: Setting a Slideshow as Your Screensaver
sect3.para: You can use a slideshow of your photos as you screensaver:

listitem.para: Press SystemPreferencesScreensaver
Select the F-Spot photos screensaver theme
Photos which are tagged as Favorites in F-Spot Photo Manager will be displayed as your screensaver

sect3.para: If you would like to change which tag is used for the slideshow:

listitem.para: Open F-Spot
Press EditPreferences
Under Screensaver, select the desired tag
Press Close

sect2.title: Printing photos
sect2.para: Printing your photos is great way to share them with others.

listitem.para: Double-click the photo you want to print to open it in the Image Viewer
Press FilePage Setup...
Under Format for, select the printer which you are going to use
Under Paper size, select the size of the paper which you are going to print the photo onto
Under Orientation, choose the orientation of the photo on the paper
Press Apply
Press FilePrint...
Change any settings as appropriate (see below)
Press Print to print the photo

sect3.title: Printer Settings
sect3.para: You can tweak your printing settings to get the best results. All of these settings can be found in the FilePrint... window.
Make sure that you select your printer from the list on the General tab to get the full range of settings supported by your printer.

note.para: Different makes of printer will have different printer settings. The settings below are only provided as a guide for what you may be able to change with your particular printer.

sect4.title: Paper Type
sect4.para: The paper type that you use has a large impact on the quality of your printed photo. You should set the paper type to match the paper which you are using in your printer to prevent poor results. Using a glossy paper type with only plain paper loaded into your printer will generally produce poor results, for example.
This setting may automatically change the amount of ink which is used, in order to get the best results and to prevent smudging. How this is handled will depend on your printer.

sect4.title: Print Quality
sect4.para: Print quality is generally measured in DPI (dots per inch). A greater DPI value should result in better print quality.

listitem.para: Choose Draft for making quick draft prints which don't use much ink
Choose Best Quality or Photo for making high quality prints. Printing will be slower and will use more ink

sect3.title: Advanced Photo Printing
sect3.para: For advanced photo printing, install PhotoPrint (see Adding, Removing and Updating Applications). Once installed, press ApplicationsGraphicsPhotoPrint to start PhotoPrint.
PhotoPrint allows you to fine-tune your printing settings.

listitem.para: Under Page Size, change the page size to the size of paper that you want to print onto.
Under Layout, change the number of columns and rows to reflect the number of photos that you want to put onto a page
To change the amount of spacing between photos, change the Horizontal and Vertical settings under Gutters
To add a photo to the page, press ImageAdd Image and select a photo
To change the advanced printer settings, press FilePrint Setup...
You may need to select the correct printer model on the Output tab
Press FilePrint to print your photos

sect2.title: Sharing your photos
sect2.para: If you want to share your collection of photos with others, why not use an online photo sharing service or burn a CD of your photos? Ubuntu has plenty of tools to help you share your pictures.

listitem.para: Print copies of your photos.
Share your photos over the Internet using a photo sharing service or a web gallery.
Burn a CD of your photos using the File Browser or F-Spot Photo Manager.
Present a slideshow of your photos.
E-mail copies of your photos directly.

sect2.title: 照片编辑与修缮
sect2.para: 某些情况下，您可以仅仅需要对照片进行调整或润色以使它更好看，或者是去掉照片中的瑕疵，F-Spot包含了一些基本的工具完成这些工作。您可以单击编辑照片按钮，然后在屏幕下方选择一个工具。
GIMP 图像编辑器是一个非常高级的照片编辑软件，它默认安装在Ubuntu中，您可以选择应用程序图像GIMP I图像编辑器来启动它。
GIMP 有很多专业级功能，它提供工具包括选取、绘制、创建路径、蒙板、滤镜和特效等等。

sect3.title: Rotating photos
sect3.para: You may find that you have some photos which are the wrong way up. It is easy to rotate photos so that they're the right way up again.
The Image Viewer, F-Spot Photo Manager, gThumb Image Viewer and the GIMP Image Editor are all capable of rotating photos.

sect3.title: Resizing photos
sect3.para: You can resize photos which are too big. If you have a photo which has a large file size, resizing it will also reduce the file size.
The GIMP Image Editor supports several methods of resizing photos. We will concentrate on the simplest method.

listitem.para: Open the photo you want to resize in the GIMP Image Editor
Press ImageScale Image...
Adjust the Width or Height as appropriate. The image will be kept to scale.
If you want to adjust the width and height independently, press the link button which connects the Width and Height boxes, so that it looks like a broken link.
Under Quality, change the Interpolation to Cubic (Best). This will give you the best quality resized image
Press Scale to resize the photo
Press FileSave As... and choose a new filename for the photo
Press Save to save the resized photo

sect1.title: Burn CDs and DVDs
sect1.para: You can make your own CDs by burning files onto a blank disc using the CD Writer Drive of your computer.
Ubuntu includes CD burning capabilities by default, and allows you to easily create data CDs, copy CDs and DVDs and create CDs from a disc image file.

sect2.title: 刻录音乐CD
sect2.para: 您可以把音乐从电脑复制到CD上，这样就可以在CD机上播放了。你必需要有一台CD刻录机来完成这项工作。
当您放入一张空白的可刻录CD时，Ubuntu会询问您是否想把它刻录成音频或数据CD。单击刻录音乐CD将会运行Serpentine程序，您也可以单击应用程序影音Serpentine Audio CD Creator来运行它。
向您的音乐CD中添加曲目，您可以从文件管理器里音乐文件拖进来，或者单击添加按钮。您还需要选择CD容量（21、74、80或90分钟），如果添加的音乐长度超出范围，Serpentine将会提示您。
The Rhythmbox Music Player is also able to burn audio CDs.

sect2.title: CD/DVD Burning Applications
sect2.para: There are a number of more advanced CD and DVD burning applications which you may find useful.

listitem.para: CD/DVD Writer GnomeBaker
Gnome CD Master
Graveman
K3b
Xfburn
